headline: MGM Resorts International (MGM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on MGM Resorts International (MGM) on MileHighMonk’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on MGM. MGM Resorts International (MGM)’s share was trading at $33.39 as of 10th June. MGM’s trailing and forward P/E were 14.5 and 14.88 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
